round_best: Develop an AI-driven platform that uses generative adversarial networks (GANs) to create novel crystalline structures. The AI will be trained on a mixture of existing crystallography data and hypothetical models that comply with fundamental crystallographic rules but vary symmetry elements, thereby pushing the envelope of possible crystal architectures. This approach will allow for the exploration of uncharted crystalline materials with potentially unique and desirable properties for specific applications in electronics and catalysis.
